p: The powder of Eucalyptus leaves (sieved with 60 mesh) was loaded into a steam distillation device (2000 mL) and extracted in an electric heating-jacket for 6 hours at 100 °C with distilled water to a solvent to sample the ratio of 15:1 mL/g. After stratification, the water was removed with anhydrous sodium sulfate. Then the essential oil was collected and stored in a brown bottle at 4 °C.
